traits.Aura of Erebos: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the giant must succeed on a DC 18+1d8 + 14 Constitution saving throw, or it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the giant's Aura of Erebos for 24 hours.
traits.Magic Resistance: The giant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
